actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: To provide for additional Border Patrol personnel and the procurement of additional mobile sensor response systems for deployment at any designated Border Patrol checkpoint in the State of Maine.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990 and 1991 for the Border Patrol of the Immigration and Naturalization Service for additional personnel and procurement of additional mobile sensor response systems for deployment at any designated Border Patrol checkpoint in Maine.

titles.title: To provide for additional Border Patrol personnel and the procurement of additional mobile sensor response systems for deployment at any designated Border Patrol checkpoint in the State of Maine.
